title: Ruck
description: Van, one of the best players in rugby and the hottest player between the sheets is looking for a miracle. His brother won the girl and Van's heart is broken. Could the gift of a lifetime be his for the taking or will this bad boy ruck it up again?  Contains steamy scenes and more balls than a girl knows what to do with.  Play – A whole lot of alpha - free romance ebook Strike – A little bit kinky Kick – A love triangle Slam – A bit of suspense Ruck – A very bad boy
author: Holly S. Roberts
